entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
